ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would definitely recommend this class to a fellow student! From this class, you can learn how the current scholarship study the issues of image, body, and relic in Buddhist tradition.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: I am going to do a dissertation on the relations and interactions between Chinese literature and religions. I will also use a lot of images in my future studies. This course is extremely helpful for me to broaden my perspective and deepen my understanding in Buddhist art.
